question: Many people in cities today live in high-rise apartment blocks. What are the advantages and disadvantages of this type of living?Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your knowledge or experience
text: In this contemporary epoch, whilst opponents hold the belief that high-level accommodations have a plethora of advantages, proponents have a diverse perspective, because that might compulsively affect many citizens who raise children . My contention will be further explained.

On the one hand, some advocates are convinced that living in multi-storey buildings is a part of this modernized world. In other words, that might be more affordable than separated houses, and that will give them the opportunity to ameliorate their future as well as exploiting their money in doing other beneficial activities. For instance, many citizens in South Africa prefer to take launes from banks to reside in these areas rather than other accommodations. Thus, what can be said is that these flats are  good value for money ,because they are relatively not expensive.

On the other hand, one might discern that living in such high buildings might be dangerous especially for those who are worried about their offspring. In other words, many juniors like to explore the environment around them . As a result, they might get fallen from any varandas . Additionally if anyone thinks about suicide he will instantly jump to harm or kill himself. For instance some teenagers in Egypt were dead because of such incidents. Hence, what can be said is that living in separated residences has many demirts ,because they might be safer although some residents have been struggling  paying their rent monthly.

In conclusion, After this essay has manifested the points mentioned above , it can be reiterated that residning in skyscrapers has a plethora of advantages ,because that will not affect our income compulsively ,and authorities ought to provide more buildings for youths in order to be able to find their livlihood.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you have an unnecessary comma before the dependent clause marker because. Consider removing the comma.
It appears that your sentence or clause uses an incorrect form of the verb exploiting. Consider changing it.
If you do not want launes to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
It appears that you have an unnecessary comma before the dependent clause marker because. Consider removing the comma.
It appears that you are missing a comma or two with the interrupter especially for those who are worried about their offspring. Consider adding the comma(s).
If you do not want varandas to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase Additionally. Consider adding a comma.
It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase For instance. Consider adding a comma.
If you do not want demirts to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
It appears that you have an unnecessary comma before the dependent clause marker because. Consider removing the comma.
The verb struggling is usually followed by the to-infinitive, not by a gerund. Change paying to the to-infinitive form.
If you do not want residning to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
